name: Big Pizza
description:
Made in Construct 3 which was not intended for 3D. Yet I managed to shape this game into this unnatural twisted form.

I also ran out of time and got stuck...but it has always been my dream to make a shit game. Just a trash game.

Controls:
Arrow Keys to move. WASD to rotate camera (Really just A & D...). Space to progress text.

Warning for not that great audio balancing.
There's also a second or two of background music from Sonic Unleashed.

Thank you to anyone who plays this. Enjoy your Big Pizza.
